name: Arpit Kansal
about: As the Secretary of the Cyber Sentinel UPES Student Chapter, I'm immersed in the cutting-edge field of network infrastructure, honing my competencies while pursuing my degree in Artificial Intelligence. My experience as a Software Intern at CosmoFleet expanded my expertise in network engineering, providing me with practical exposure to software infrastructure challenges and solutions. My academic journey and hands-on roles have fostered a robust understanding of the Internet of Things and cloud services, as evidenced by my CertNexus and AWS Academy certifications. These experiences underscore my commitment to innovation and my goal to contribute significantly to the tech industry's evolution.

name: Jaya Shrivastava
position: Data Analyst | Power BI| 6+ Years of QA & Banking Experience |
about: I am an aspiring Data Analyst with over 6 years of professional experience spanning Quality Assurance, Testing, and Banking operations‚Äînow transitioning into the exciting field of Data Analytics. Currently interning at VSKA World Pvt. Ltd., I work with Power BI, SQL, and Python to transform complex data into clear insights that support strategic business decisions. My past roles in QA and Banking have honed my analytical mindset, problem-solving skills, and ability to work across functions. With hands-on experience in data visualization, testing, and operations, I bring a unique perspective that blends technical proficiency with business understanding. I'm passionate about leveraging data to optimize processes and drive decision-making. Currently deepening my knowledge through a Data Science Certification, I am eager to contribute to projects that require data-driven insights, dashboarding, and business analysis. Let‚Äôs connect to collaborate, share ideas, or discuss opportunities in Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, and Technology-led innovation.
